title: This code adds outwardly increasing shadows to an image to create a “sticker” version of the image.

inline_content.Text: This code adds outwardly increasing shadows to an image to create a “sticker” version of the image.

title: In addition to being an ImageObject, the “img” argument can also be a Canvas element. This allows you to stickerize your own custom drawings. If you draw text on the Canvas argument, you can also stickerize that text.

inline_content.Text: In addition to being an ImageObject, the “img” argument can also be a Canvas element. This allows you to stickerize your own custom drawings. If you draw text on the Canvas argument, you can also stickerize that text.

title: Fully opaque images will have no sticker effect because the effect is drawn around clusters of opaque pixels that are bordered by transparent pixels.

inline_content.Text: Fully opaque images will have no sticker effect because the effect is drawn around clusters of opaque pixels that are bordered by transparent pixels.
